org.soulwing.prospecto.api

Interface ViewTemplateBuilder


  • public interface ViewTemplateBuilder
    A builder for a ViewTemplate.

    The builder maintains a tree structure of nodes that correspond to the nodes of a view.

    There are four fundamental node types:

    • value — a single value of a type that has a simple textual representation; e.g. string, number, boolean, etc
    • object — a collection of named properties each of which has an associated node
    • array-of-values — an ordered collection of values of a single type that has a simple textual representation; e.g. string, number, boolean, etc
    • array-of-object — an ordered collection of objects the same "type"; the type is a collection of named properties each of which has an associated node
    The builder has a cursor which initially points at the root node. Methods that add a new node act at this cursor, and subsequently reposition the cursor such that it points at the newly added node.

    After adding a node of type object or array-of-object the cursor is positioned such that the next node added will be the first child of the object/array-of-object node. A subsequently added node will be the next sibling of the first child, etc. When all siblings have been added to a given object or array-of-object, the end() method can be used to reposition the cursor such that it points at the last child added to the parent node.

    Author:
    Carl Harris

      • arrayOfValues

                                Class<?> componentType)
        Adds an array-of-values node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        name - name for the array in the view
        componentType - common type of the elements; all elements need not be of the same type, but the most specific type that is common to all elements should be given here
        Returns:
        this builder

      • object

        ViewTemplateBuilder object(String name,
                         ViewTemplate template)
        Adds an object node at the cursor using the root node of the given template.

        NOTE: this method returns the same builder instance, rather than a sub-builder; the template provides the full structure of the object node.

        Parameters:
        name - name for the node in the view produced by this builder
        template - source template
        Returns:
        this builder

      • envelope

        ViewTemplateBuilder envelope(String name)
        Adds an envelope node at the cursor.

        An envelope inserts an extra node of type object in the view, but the source model for properties of the object is the parent node.

        Parameters:
        name - name for the node in the view
        Returns:
        template builder for new envelope

      • envelope

        ViewTemplateBuilder envelope(String name,
                           String namespace)
        Adds an envelope node at the cursor.

        An envelope inserts an extra node of type object in the view, but the source model for properties of the object is the parent node.

        Parameters:
        name - name for the node in the view
        namespace - namespace for name; used in only some view types (e.g. XML)
        Returns:
        template builder for new envelope

      • subtype

        ViewTemplateBuilder subtype(Class<?> subtype)
        Introduces a subtype of the type associated with the current object or array-of-objects node.

        This allows properties of a subtype to be included in the object or array-of-objects node being described.

        A discriminator must be added to the object or array-of-objects node before a subtyoe can be introduced. s

        Parameters:
        subtype - class which must be a descendant of the model type specified for the parent object or array-of-objects node
        Returns:
        template builder for the new subtype

      • discriminator

        ViewTemplateBuilder discriminator()
        Adds a subtype discriminator at the cursor.

        When the view is evaluated a DiscriminatorStrategy will be retrieved from the view context to produce the discriminator name/value. If no strategy is configured a default implementation will be provided.

        A discriminator (if present) must be added as the first child of an object or array-of-objects node that has multiple subtypes.

        Returns:
        this builder

      • discriminator

        ViewTemplateBuilder discriminator(Class<? extends DiscriminatorStrategy> discriminatorClass,
                                Object... configuration)
        Adds a subtype discriminator at the cursor.

        A discriminator (if present) must be added as the first child of an object or array-of-objects node that has multiple subtypes.

        Parameters:
        discriminatorClass - discriminator strategy class
        configuration - name-value pairs that will be used to configure the strategy instance after it has been constructed; each pair specifies the name of a configuration property and the corresponding value
        Returns:
        this builder

      • discriminator

        ViewTemplateBuilder discriminator(Class<? extends DiscriminatorStrategy> discriminatorClass,
                                Map configuration)
        Adds a subtype discriminator at the cursor.

        A discriminator (if present) must be added as the first child of an object or array-of-objects node that has multiple subtypes.

        Parameters:
        discriminatorClass - discriminator strategy class
        configuration - name-value pairs that will be used to configure the strategy instance after it has been constructed; each pair specifies the name of a configuration property and the corresponding value
        Returns:
        this builder

      • discriminator

        ViewTemplateBuilder discriminator(DiscriminatorStrategy discriminator)
        Adds a subtype discriminator at the cursor.

        A discriminator (if present) must be added as the first child of an object or array-of-objects node that has multiple subtypes.

        Parameters:
        discriminator - discriminator strategy
        Returns:
        this builder

      • source

        ViewTemplateBuilder source(String name)
        Specifies the name of the model property that is the source for the node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        name - model property name
        Returns:
        this builder

      • accessType

        ViewTemplateBuilder accessType(AccessType accessType)
        Specifies the access type that will be used to access the model property associated with the node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        accessType - access type
        Returns:
        this builder

      • allow

        ViewTemplateBuilder allow(AccessMode mode,
                        AccessMode... modes)
        Specifies the access modes that will be allowed on the model property associated with the node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        modes - the modes to allow
        Returns:
        this builder

      • allow

        ViewTemplateBuilder allow(EnumSet<AccessMode> modes)
        Specifies the access modes that will be allowed on the model property associated with the node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        modes - the modes to allow
        Returns:
        this builder

      • converter

        ViewTemplateBuilder converter(Class<? extends ValueTypeConverter> converterClass,
                            Object... configuration)
        Specifies a converter that will be used to transform the model property associated with the node at the cursor.

        An instance of the specified converter will be constructed and configured and will be used by only the value node at the cursor instead of consulting converters registered with the view context.

        Parameters:
        converterClass - converter class
        configuration - name-value pairs that will be used to configure the converter instance after it has been constructed; each pair specifies the name of a configuration property and the corresponding value
        Returns:
        this builder

      • converter

        ViewTemplateBuilder converter(Class<? extends ValueTypeConverter> converterClass,
                            Map configuration)
        Specifies a converter that will be used to transform the model property associated with the node at the cursor.

        An instance of the specified converter will be constructed and configured and will be used by only the value node at the cursor instead of consulting converters registered with the view context.

        Parameters:
        converterClass - converter class
        configuration - name-value pairs that will be used to configure the converter instance after it has been constructed; each pair specifies the name of a configuration property and the corresponding value
        Returns:
        this builder

      • converter

        ViewTemplateBuilder converter(ValueTypeConverter<?> converter)
        Specifies a converter that will be used to transform the model property associated with the node at the cursor.

        The given converter instance will be used by the value node at the cursor instead of consulting converters registered with the view context.

        Parameters:
        converter - converter class
        Returns:
        this builder

      • attribute

        ViewTemplateBuilder attribute(Object value)
        Puts an attribute into the scope associated with the node at the cursor.
        Parameters:
        value - the attribute value to put
        Returns:
        this builder

        ViewTemplateBuilder attribute(String name,
                            Object value)

        Parameters:
        name - name for the attribute
        value - the attribute value to put
        Returns:
        this builder

      • end

        ViewTemplateBuilder end()
        Moves the cursor to the parent of the cursor node.

        If the cursor is already positioned at the root node, this method has no effect.

        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        ViewTemplate build()
        Builds the template that corresponds to the node tree structure contained in this builder instance.
        Returns:
        view template
        Throws:
        ViewTemplateException - if this method is invoked when the cursor is positioned on a node that not a child of the root node
